entry.title: Chevron Home Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 108.00

Meet your new partner in cozy. Our heaviest-weight blanket, the Chevron Home Blanket is a perfect cool-weather companion, ideal for a sunset beach bonfire, a snowy cabin getaway, or a movie marathon at home. Not only is this throw blanket functional, but it also earns style points with tasseled edges, a chevron pattern, and a soft handfeel.


FEATURES

  • Individually hand-loomed in India

  • Halfmoon’s heaviest-weight blanket at 3 lbs

  • Soft cotton blend with chevron motif

  • Tasseled edges

  • Best used as an outdoor blanket or home decor piece. (We recommend the Cotton Yoga Blanket for use on your mat.)

SPECS

  • 58% Cotton/32% Acrylic/10% Polyester

  • 59"x78"/150x200cm

  • 3 lbs


PRODUCT CARE 

  • Gentle cycle cold wash

  • Hang to dry or tumble dry low heat

  • Notes: Any shedding will decrease with use and additional washing

entry.title: Mat Clean 8oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mat Clean
Price: 18.00

Our Natural Mat Clean Unscented is a synergistic blend of natural cleansing and disinfecting ingredients that removes dirt and kills germs in a natural way.


FEATURES

  • 100% natural

  • Non-toxic, recycled bottle


SPECS

  • Volume: 8oz

  • Ingredients: Purified Water, Witch Hazel Distillate, Lauryl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate

  • Made in Vancouver, BC, Canada


HOW TO USE

  • Spray mat liberally, allow to sit for a few minutes then wipe. Allow mat to dry fully before rolling.

  • Do not store in direct sunlight

entry.title: Mat Clean 1L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mat Clean
Price: 48.00

Our Natural Mat Clean Unscented is a synergistic blend of natural cleansing and disinfecting ingredients that removes dirt, and kills germs in a natural way


FEATURES

  • 100% natural

  • Non-toxic, recycled bottle


SPECS

  • Volume: 1L

  • Ingredients: Purified Water, Witch Hazel Distillate, Lauryl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate

  • Made in Vancouver, BC, Canada


HOW TO USE

  • Spray mat liberally, allow to sit for a few minutes then wipe

  • Allow mat to dry fully before rolling

  • Do not store in direct sunlight

  • Some individuals are sensitive to essential oils—discontinue use if you have an allergic reaction

entry.title: Mat Clean
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mat Clean
Price: 18.00

Our Natural Mat Clean - Cool Mint, is a synergistic blend of natural cleansing and disinfecting ingredients that removes dirt and kills germs in a natural way.

Cool Mint calms, grounds, and refreshes. Upfront floral notes of Lavender, complemented by full-bodied scents of peppermint, eucalyptus, rosemary, and hints of citrus, make this mat spray a dream for your mat and your nose.


FEATURES

  • 100% natural
  • Made with pure essential oils
  • Non-toxic, recycled bottle
  • Soothing lavender mint scent
  • Made in Vancouver, BC, Canada


SPECS

  • Volume: 8oz
  • Ingredients: Aqua (purified water), Hamamelis Virginiana (witch hazel - antibacterial antifungal) distillate (and) alcohol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Peppermint Essential Oil, Lavender Essential Oil, Eucalyptus Essential Oil, Rosemary Essential Oil, Cajeput Essential Oil, Vetiver Essential Oil, Citric Acid (natural disinfectant), Potassium Sorbate


HOW TO USE

  • Spray mat liberally, allow to sit for a few minutes then wipe
  • Allow mat to dry fully before rolling
  • Do not store in direct sunlight
  • Some individuals are sensitive to essential oils—discontinue use if you have an allergic reaction

entry.title: Mat Clean
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mat Clean
Price: 18.00

Our Natural Mat Clean in Citrus Glow is a synergistic blend of natural cleansing and disinfecting ingredients that removes dirt and kills germs in a natural way. Citrus Glow highlights scents from the freshest of nature's citrus fruits: Sweet Orange, Lemon, Lime, and Grapefruit.  Notes of Bergamot and Ylang Ylang round out this new go-to natural mat cleaner.


FEATURES

  • 100% natural

  • Made with pure essential oils

  • Non-toxic, recycled bottle

  • Refreshing citrus scent


SPECS

  • Volume: 8oz

  • Ingredients: Aqua (purified water), Hamamelis Virginiana (witch hazel - antibacterial antifungal) distillate (and) alcohol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sweet Orange Essential Oil, Lemon Essential Oil, Lime Essential Oil, Grapefruit White Essential Oil, Bergamot Essential Oil, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil, Citric Acid (a natural disinfectant), Potassium Sorbate

  • Made in Vancouver, BC, Canada


HOW TO USE

  • Spray mat liberally, allow to sit for a few minutes then wipe

  • Allow mat to dry fully before rolling

  • Do not store in direct sunlight

  • Some individuals are sensitive to essential oils—discontinue use if you have an allergic reaction

entry.title: 3" Foam Yoga Block
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Foam Yoga Blocks
Price: 16.00

Our 3" Foam Yoga Block gives you a mild, medium, or intense lift depending on which end you prop it on. This allows you to have comfort, stability and grounding throughout your asana practice. These foam blocks are lightweight for easy mobility while you practice and are gentle on the body.


FEATURES

  • Soft & comfortable

  • Moderate density

  • Lightweight


SPECS

  • 9" x 6" x 3" (23 cm x 15 cm x 7.6 cm)

  • 4 oz (113 g)

  • 100% EVA foam spray

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Spray with our Mat Cleanser, or a damp cloth with a mild/natural disinfectant (vinegar, mild soap)

  • Wipe and air dry before storage

entry.title: Chip Foam Yoga Block
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Foam Yoga Blocks
Price: 18.00

Our Chip Foam Block is one of our most versatile props. The foam is dense enough to offer solid support, yet soft enough to provide padding for knees, elbows, or hips. Whether seated, standing, reclined, inverted, or twisted, this block can bring comfort, depth, lift, or support to any practice. Elevate your yoga practice with this stackable block.


FEATURES

  • Made from foam offcuts

  • Colour may vary

  • Moderate density for comfort and support


SPECS

  • 2" x 8" x 12" (5 cm x 20 cm x 30 cm)

  • 1.3 lbs (0.6 kg)

  • Block made in Canada

  • Cover handcrafted in India


PRODUCT CARE

  • Extend the life of your chip foam block with a removable cover

  • Store away from UV light

entry.title: 6' Organic Cotton Loop Strap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Loop Yoga Strap
Price: 20.00

Our 6' Organic Cotton Loop Strap was designed with a fixed loop on one end for easy and quick use during your yoga practice. Deepen your stretches, gain easier access into binds, and extend your reach with this multi-posture tool. 


FEATURES

  • Organic cotton

  • Fixed loop end

  • Soft cotton hand feel


SPECS

  • 1.5" x 6’ (3.8 cm x 183 cm)

  • 100% organic cotton webbing with brushed nickel slide buckle

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Hand wash in cold water, hang to dry

entry.title: 4" Foam Yoga Block
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Foam Yoga Blocks
Price: 20.00

Our 4" Foam Yoga Block gives you a mild, medium, or intense lift depending on which end you prop it on. This allows you to have comfort, stability and grounding throughout your asana practice. These foam blocks are lightweight for easy mobility while you practice and are gentle on the body.


FEATURES

  • Soft & comfortable

  • Moderate density

  • Lightweight


SPECS

  • 9" x 6" x 4" (23 cm x 15 cm x 10 cm)

  • 6.7 oz (190 g)

  • 100% EVA foam spray

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Spray with our Mat Cleanser, or a damp cloth with a mild/natural disinfectant (vinegar, mild soap)

  • Wipe and air dry before storage

entry.title: Cotton Yoga Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Cotton Yoga Blanket
Price: 58.00

Our Classic Cotton Yoga Blanket is the perfect addition to your yoga practice in the studio, or at home. Simple, functional, and beautiful. This blanket provides gentle cushioning, support, or warmth depending on your use. The versatile design can be rolled like a bolster, folded to add height like a block or cushion, or used to cover the body like a traditional blanket. Woven with flat selvage edges makes this blanket design easy to fold and roll flat and evenly making it safe and consistent in shape for all your postures.

Woven by skilled artisan weavers in India, made with love and care, each blanket is unique. Please note, imperfections to the look and appearance may occur which add to the beauty of each handcrafted blanket.


FEATURES

  • Individually hand-loomed in India

  • soft hand feel

  • Large size for full-body coverage in savasana

  • Flat selvage edges


SPECS

  • 60" x 80" (152 cm x 203 cm)

  • 2.72 lbs (1.2 kgs)

  • 100% cotton

  • Made in India


PRODUCT CARE

  • Gentle cycle cold wash separately 

  • Hang to dry or tumble dry low heat


NOTES

  • Tumble dry may tighten the weave

  • Any shedding will decrease with use and additional washing

entry.title: Cork Yoga Block
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Cork Blocks
Price: 25.00

Our Natural Cork Yoga Block is made from sustainably harvested cork that provides comfort, stability, and support for your asana practice. Sturdy, strong, and built to last, these blocks can aid you in supporting ease or depths in any type of yoga.


FEATURES

  • Weighted for stability

  • Strong and supportive

  • Rounded ergonomic corners


SPECS

  • 3.5” × 5.5” × 9” (9 cm × 14 cm × 23cm)

  • 2.1 lbs (0.95 kg)

  • 100% natural cork

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Option 1: Natural/non-aggressive spray (like our Mat Cleanser) and wipe to dry

  • Option 2: Sprinkle baking soda over the surface of the cork, place in a large freezer bag, place the bag in the freezer for 1-2 days. Unwrap and wipe down.

  • Always allow to air dry before storage

entry.title: Chip Foam Yoga Block Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Foam Yoga Blocks
Price: 22.00

Our Chip Foam Block Cover can be used to increase the longevity or change up the look of this highly versatile prop -- the Chip Foam Block! This easy to remove cover allows for easy cleaning.


FEATURES

  • Hook and loop cover closure

  • Shrink resistant microtech fabric

  • Easy to remove

  • Easy to clean


SPECS

  • Fits any 2" x 8" x 12" (5 cm x 20 cm x 30 cm) Chip Foam Yoga Block

  • Chip Foam Block NOT included

  • Handcrafted in India


PRODUCT CARE

  • Close the hook and loop closure before washing

  • Machine wash in cold water

  • Tumble dry low or hang to dry

entry.title: Limited Edition Cylindrical Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Cylindrical 24"
Price: 110.00

Our Cylindrical Bolster facilitates deep chest opening and back bending with it's 8" high diameter—the highest of our bolster lineup. The contoured, ergonomic shape fits perfectly under your knees while lying on your back providing relief for your lower back. Try it horizontally across the shoulder blades while on your back for an upper back extension. Alternatively, try vertical along the spine for deep chest opening and expansion. Find new depths in your posture and breath with one of our favourite bolster shapes

This product is part of our Halfmoon Limited Edition Collection, a limited-time offering showcasing the Halfmoon creative vision for that season. Carefully selecting patterns and prints allows us to bring to life modern, quality, and current fabrics that will enhance and elevate your studio, home, or zen space. Reinvigorate your meditation and yoga practice with these curated selections.


FEATURES

  • Dense, quality, handmade interior batting for longevity

  • Removable cover

  • Easy carry handle

  • Exceptional quality & durability


SPECS

  • 24" x 8" x 8" (61cm x 20cm x 20cm)

  • Cover: 100% cotton 

  • Casing: 100% cotton

  • Filling: 96% cotton, 3% polyester, 1% foam fill

  • 5.5 lbs

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover from the bolster. Machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle

  • Hang to dry

  • Do not bleach

  • Lint Removal Tip: wipe bolster with a latex-gloved hand or a lint roller


NOTES

  • During manufacturing, we reinforce the handles on our bolsters to ensure a strong seam.

  • Ripped seams may occur or be exaggerated from friction either when removing it from storage or how the bolster is carried to and from practice. Take extra care and be mindful of the delicacy of the product.

entry.title: Essential Cotton Mini Prana Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mini Prana 15"
Price: 58.00

Our Mini Prana Bolster is a handy little bolster that promotes a gentle chest opening, subtly elevates your Pigeon pose, and provides a boost in "legs up the wall". This firm and supportive, high-quality bolster offers a softer and more gentle alternative to any posture that calls for a block. 

TIP: Great for kids' yoga too!

This product is part of our Halfmoon Essential Cotton Collection and is made of 100% all-natural cotton fibers that resist shrinking, stretching, and are highly durable. This 100% natural plant-derived fiber is biodegradable, easy-to-clean, and breathable making it a perfect studio-friendly core item. The Essential Cotton Collection is all custom-dyed for Halfmoon specifically, making the colours exclusive to the Halfmoon lineup and core colour stories. 


FEATURES

  • Dense, quality, handmade interior batting for longevity

  • Removable cover

  • Easy carry handle

  • Exceptional quality & durability


SPECS

  • 6" x 3" x 15" (15 cm x 8 cm x 38 cm)

  • 1.8 lbs (0.8 kg)

  • Cover: 100% cotton

  • Casing: 100% cotton 

  • Filling: 97% cotton, 3% polyester

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover from bolster, machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle, hang to dry

  • Lint Removal Tip: wipe bolster with a latex-gloved hand or a lint roller


NOTES

  • During manufacturing, we reinforce the handles on our bolsters to ensure a strong seam.

  • Ripped seams may occur or be exaggerated from friction either when removing it from storage or how the bolster is carried to and from practice. Take extra care and be mindful of the delicacy of the product.

entry.title: Essential Cotton Restorative Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Restorative 28"
Price: 96.00

Our Restorative Bolster was designed specifically for the restorative practice or for those tall yogis (>6ft) who benefit from some extra length on their bolster. The rectangular shape promotes a gentle chest opening and subtle back-bending when placing it beneath the spine and lying on your back. This bolster's generous size and flat stable surface area are designed to perfectly support your entire upper body in restorative yoga poses like Supported Fish and Supported Twist. 

This product is part of our Halfmoon Essential Cotton Collection and is made of 100% all-natural cotton fibers that resist shrinking, stretching, and are highly durable. This 100% natural plant-derived fiber is biodegradable, easy-to-clean, and breathable making it a perfect studio-friendly core item. The Essential Cotton Collection is all custom-dyed for Halfmoon specifically, making the colours exclusive to the Halfmoon lineup and core colour stories.


FEATURES

  • Designed to be long enough for a restorative yoga practice

  • Optimal bolster size for people who are over 6 feet tall

  • Handy carry handle makes it easy to take it with you

  • Removable & washable cover


SPECS

  • 5" x 10" x 28" (13 cm x 25 cm x 71 cm)

  • 5 lbs (2.3 kg)

  • Cover: 100% cotton 

  • Casing: 100% cotton 

  • Filling: Natural cotton batting fill processed in BC

  • Polyurethane foam manufactured in BC

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover from the bolster. Machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle. Hang to dry

  • Lint Removal Tip: wipe bolster with a latex-gloved hand or a lint roller


NOTES

  • During manufacturing, we reinforce the handles on our bolsters to ensure a strong seam

  • Ripped seams may occur or be exaggerated from friction either when removing it from storage or how the bolster is carried to and from practice. Take extra care and be mindful of the delicacy of the product.

entry.title: Essential Cotton Rectangular Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon

Our Rectangular Bolster promotes gentle chest opening, makes a great back bending prop, and provides a moderate lift for forward bends and legs up the wall. Its generous size creates a stable, comfortable surface—so stretch out, lie back, and relax!

entry.title: Essential Cotton Prana Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Prana 26"
Price: 68.00

Our Prana Yoga Bolster was designed to facilitate deeper breathing and gentle openings. Its 26" length supports the entire spine, from the low back to the head. And the narrow width and gentle lift allow the chest to relax and open, increasing lung capacity and space across the chest. The perfect addition to your pranayama or asana practice.

This product is part of our Halfmoon Essential Cotton Collection and is made of 100% all-natural cotton fibers that resist shrinking, stretching, and are highly durable. This 100% natural plant-derived fiber is biodegradable, easy-to-clean, and breathable making it a perfect studio-friendly core item. The Essential Cotton Collection is all custom-dyed for Halfmoon specifically, making the colours exclusive to the Halfmoon lineup and core colour stories.

  • Handy carry handle makes it easy to take it with you

  • Exceptional quality & durability

entry.title: Limited Edition Mini Cylindrical Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mini Cylindrical 16"
Price: 55.00

Our Mini Cylindrical Bolster is our most malleable and compact bolster option. Unlike our other cotton-filled bolster offerings, this mini bolster is filled with Canadian buckwheat hulls so that the prop can move, mold, and shape to your body. We intentionally filled this bolster to approximately 60% capacity (~2 lbs) to allow the hulls to hug around the back of the neck, under the seat/hips, or along the spine during practice.

This product is part of our Halfmoon Limited Edition Collection is a limited time offering showcasing Halfmoon's creative vision for that season. Carefully selecting patterns and prints allows us to bring to life modern, quality and current fabrics that will enhance and elevate your studio, home or zen space. Reinvigorate life into your meditation and yoga practice with these curated selections.

  • Removable cover

  • Easy carry handle

  • Exceptional quality & durability


SPECS

  • 5.5" x 16" (14 cm x 41 cm)

  • Cover: 100% cotton 

  • Casing: 100% cotton

  • Filling: natural Canadian buckwheat hulls

  • 2 lbs (0.91kg)

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Hang to dry

  • Do not bleach

  • Lint Removal Tip: wipe bolster with a latex-gloved hand or a lint roller

  • Ripped seams may occur or be exaggerated from friction either when removing it from storage or how the bolster is carried to and from practice. Take extra care and be mindful of the delicacy of the product.

entry.summary:

Price: 110.00

Try it horizontally across the shoulder blades while on your back for an upper back extension. Alternatively, try vertical along the spine for deep chest opening and expansion. Find new depths in your posture and breath with one of our favourite bolster shapes

This product is part of our Halfmoon Premium Linen Collection and is a premium, timeless, and earth-friendly option within our textile lineup. With an elevated, yet artisanal aesthetic, you can invest in this luxurious fabric option in good-conscience. The low levels of water used to grow the flax plants in creating these fibers make it much more earth-friendly than alternative fibers in the market. Bonus: Our linens not only have a soft hand feel and cooling properties but also are biodegradable!


FEATURES

  • Dense, quality, handmade interior batting for longevity

  • Removable cover

  • Easy carry handle

  • Exceptional quality & durability


SPECS

  • 24" x 8" x 8" (61cm x 20cm x 20cm)

  • Cover: 100% linen 

  • Casing: 100% cotton

  • Filling: 96% cotton, 3% polyester, 1% foam fill

  • 5.5 lbs

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover from the bolster. Machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle

  • Hang to dry

  • Do not bleach

  • Lint Removal Tip: wipe bolster with a latex-gloved hand or a lint roller


NOTES

  • During manufacturing, we reinforce the handles on our bolsters to ensure a strong seam.

  • Ripped seams may occur or be exaggerated from friction when removing from storage or when carrying to and from practice. Take extra care and be mindful of the delicacy of the product.

entry.title: Linen Mini Cylindrical Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mini Cylindrical 16"
Price: 55.00

Our Mini Cylindrical Bolster is our most malleable and compact bolster option. Unlike our other cotton-filled bolster offerings, this mini bolster is filled with Canadian buckwheat hulls so that the prop can move, mold, and shape to your body. We intentionally filled this bolster to approximately 60% capacity (~2 lbs) to allow the hulls to hug around the back of the neck, under the seat/hips, or along the spine during practice.

This product is part of our Halfmoon Premium Linen Collection and is a premium, timeless, and earth-friendly option within our textile lineup. With an elevated, yet artisanal aesthetic, you can invest in this luxurious fabric option in good-conscience. The low levels of water used to grow the flax plants in creating these fibres, make it much more earth-friendly than alternative fibres in the market. Bonus: Our linens not only have a soft hand feel and cooling properties but are also biodegradable!


FEATURES

  • Compact & malleable bolster

  • Small size for convenience and maneuverability

  • Multi-purpose for use in a variety of poses

  • Exceptional quality & durability

  • Removable & washable cover


SPECS

  • 5.5" x 16" (14 cm x 41 cm)

  • 2 lbs (0.91kgs)

  • Filled with natural Canadian buckwheat hulls

  • Cushions are filled by volume. Due to the natural differences in buckwheat, weight may vary by +/- 5%

  • Cover: 100% linen

  • 100% cotton casing made in India

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover from the bolster. Machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle

  • Hang to dry

  • Do not bleach

  • Lint Removal Tip: wipe bolster with a latex-gloved hand or a lint roller


NOTES

  • During manufacturing, we reinforce the handles on our bolsters to ensure a strong seam.

  • Ripped seams may occur or be exaggerated from friction when removing from storage or when carrying to and from practice. Take extra care and be mindful of the delicacy of the product.

entry.title: Linen Restorative Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Restorative 28"
Price: 112.00

Our Restorative Bolster was designed specifically for the restorative practice or for those tall yogis (>6ft) who benefit from some extra length on their bolster. The rectangular shape promotes a gentle chest opening and subtle back-bending when placing it beneath the spine and lying on your back. This bolster's generous size and flat stable surface area are designed to perfectly support your entire upper body in restorative yoga poses like Supported Fish and Supported Twist. 

This product is part of our Halfmoon Premium Linen Collection and is a premium, timeless, and earth-friendly option within our textile lineup. With an elevated, yet artisanal aesthetic, you can invest in this luxurious fabric option in good-conscience. The low levels of water used to grow the flax plants in creating these fibers, make it much more earth-friendly than alternative fibers in the market. Bonus: Our linens not only have a soft hand feel and cooling properties but also are biodegradable!


FEATURES

  • Designed to be long enough for a restorative yoga practice

  • Optimal bolster size for people who are over 6 feet tall

  • Handy carry handle makes it easy to take it with you

  • Removable & washable cover


SPECS

  • 5" x 10" x 28" (13 cm x 25 cm x 71 cm)

  • 5 lbs (2.3 kg)

  • Cover: 100% linen 

  • Casing: 100% cotton 

  • Filling: Natural cotton batting fill processed in BC

  • Polyurethane foam manufactured in BC

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover from the bolster. Machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle. Hang to dry

  • Lint Removal Tip: wipe bolster with a latex-gloved hand or a lint roller


NOTES

  • During manufacturing, we reinforce the handles on our bolsters to ensure a strong seam

  • Ripped seams may occur or be exaggerated from friction either when removing it from storage or how the bolster is carried to and from practice. Take extra care and be mindful of the delicacy of the product.
